column4: hey guys. im trying to remove ubuntu due to ati being shit and wine not working right. i need to remove ubuntu and grub because i tried to just delete the partitions but grub was still on there and i kept getting error 22, and my pc was just stuck there. hwo do i go about removing everything properly?
removing GRUB doesnt help you, you have to install the ms-windows boot loader, which i luckily already forgot everything #windows ?
